app_description: ptTranslator a professional Portuguese translation software helps travel communication and Portuguese learning. core function Text translation: Portuguese translation Italian native language library give you the most authentic Portuguese translation. Photo translation: support Portuguese text recognition mobile phone photo text recognition translation efficient and accurate text extraction translation. Speech translation: support Portuguese speech recognition and fast Portuguese speech input and translation. This is a must for traveling in Italy. Translation collection: Portuguese learning new words difficult words professional vocabulary can be collected and reviewed at any time. Portuguese learning Letter pronunciation: Portuguese 26 letter pronunciation table online learning real person pronunciation follow. Common spoken language: select 100 sentences of daily spoken language and 1800 spoken language and travel common words. Listening and learning: Portuguese audio programs are learned from the beginning elementary intermediate and advanced levels. description of automatic renewal VIP package Subscription period: 12 months year VIP membership consecutive years . Please pay attention to the subscription and deduction situation in time. Cancel renewal: to cancel automatic renewal please cancel 24 hours before the expiration of the current subscription period.
